com.nordicid.nurapi

Class AccSensorConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.AccSensorConfig

  • public class AccSensorConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Nur accessory sensor configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected byte feature
      Features supported by this sensor as a bitmask (see AccessorySensorFeature).
      protected byte mode
      Configurable bitmask specifying how sensor changes are reported.
      ACC_SENSOR_SOURCE source
      Sensor/GPIO pin number changes will be reported on.
      ACC_SENSOR_TYPE type
      Type of sensor (see AccessorySensorType).

    • Field Detail

      • source

        public ACC_SENSOR_SOURCE source
        Sensor/GPIO pin number changes will be reported on. Assigned by reader. 0: GPIO pin 1 1: GPIO pin 2 2: GPIO pin 3 3: GPIO pin 4 128: Device tap sensor 130: USB sensor (connected directly or to USB hub port 1) 131: USB sensor (connected to USB hub port 2) 132: USB sensor (connected to USB hub port 3) 133: USB sensor (connected to USB hub port 4) 134: ToF sensor

      • type

        public ACC_SENSOR_TYPE type
        Type of sensor (see AccessorySensorType). Assigned by reader.

      • feature

        protected byte feature
        Features supported by this sensor as a bitmask (see AccessorySensorFeature). Assigned by reader.

      • mode

        protected byte mode
        Configurable bitmask specifying how sensor changes are reported.
        See Also:
        ACC_SENSOR_MODE_FLAG
